summary: Reusable medical equipment, such as a flexible, camera-bearing endoscope, must be reprocessed between uses. It must be cleaned, disinfected or sterilized. The Veterans Health Administration has rules for such steps and oversees the process in VA Medical Centers. title: VA Health Care: Improved Oversight Needed for Reusable Medical Equipment
